Detailed Description

Controller for the About section.

The About section collects information pages that illustrate the website, the technologies it relies upon, and something about the author.

Definition at line 10 of file about_controller.php.

AboutController::index (  ) 

Default action method.

This method simply performs a redirection to the action claudio.
